description: Creates a gateway, which is a virtual or edge device that delivers industrial data streams from local servers to IoT SiteWise. For more information, see Ingesting data using a gateway in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

parameters.name: gatewayName
parameters.description: A unique name for the gateway.

parameters.name: gatewayPlatform
parameters.description: The gateway's platform. You can only specify one platform in a gateway. greengrass (dict) --- A gateway that runs on IoT Greengrass. The ARN of the Greengrass group. For more information about how to find a group's ARN, see ListGroups and GetGroup in the IoT Greengrass V1 API Reference. greengrassV2 (dict) --- A gateway that runs on IoT Greengrass V2. The name of the IoT thing for your IoT Greengrass V2 core device. coreDeviceOperatingSystem (string) --- The operating system of the core device in IoT Greengrass V2. siemensIE (dict) --- A SiteWise Edge gateway that runs on a Siemens Industrial Edge Device. The name of the IoT Thing for your SiteWise Edge gateway.

nested_params.name: greengrass
nested_params.description: A gateway that runs on IoT Greengrass.

nested_params.name: groupArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the Greengrass group. For more information about how to find a group's ARN, see ListGroups and GetGroup in the IoT Greengrass V1 API Reference.

nested_params.name: greengrassV2
nested_params.description: A gateway that runs on IoT Greengrass V2.

nested_params.name: coreDeviceThingName
nested_params.description: The name of the IoT thing for your IoT Greengrass V2 core device.

nested_params.name: coreDeviceOperatingSystem
nested_params.description: The operating system of the core device in IoT Greengrass V2.

nested_params.name: siemensIE
nested_params.description: A SiteWise Edge gateway that runs on a Siemens Industrial Edge Device.

nested_params.name: iotCoreThingName
nested_params.description: The name of the IoT Thing for your SiteWise Edge gateway.

parameters.name: gatewayVersion
parameters.description: The version of the gateway to create. Specify 3 to create an MQTT-enabled, V3 gateway and 2 To create a Classic streams, V2 gateway. If the version isn't specified, a Classic streams, V2 gateway is created by default. We recommend creating an MQTT-enabled, V3 gateway for self-hosted gateways. SiteWise Edge gateways on Siemens Industrial Edge should use gateway version 2. For more information on gateway versions, see Self-host a SiteWise Edge gateway with IoT Greengrass V2.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the gateway. For more information, see Tagging your IoT SiteWise resources in the IoT SiteWise User Guide. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: gatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the gateway device. You can use this ID when you call other IoT SiteWise API operations.

nested_items.name: gatewayArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the gateway, which has the following format.
